# Set Gravity
<!--
@name: Set Gravity
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Set the Gravity to apply on all Actors
## Parameters


- _X_ (optional): Global gravity value in X. 0.0 by default.
- _Y_ (optional): Global gravity value in Y. 1.0 by default.
---
